p: Resin comes from the dried leaves (‘marijuana’), the more potent female flowering heads of the plant (‘sinsemilla’), or the sticky cannabis resin that can be smoked or consumed in a variety of foodstuffs. Several cannabinoids are present in the plant resin, but THC is considered the most active and main psychoactive agent. Hashish is the resin extracted from the top of the flowering plant and is higher in THC concentration than marijuana.
